alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:16AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Walton, south central Holmes and western Washington Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 816 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Eglin Air Force Base, or 12 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Westville, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, Portland, Whitehead Crossroads, Rock Hill, Bruce, Red Head, Eucheeanna, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry and Knox Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; South Walton; Washington
